ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Milgrom,Dave Cockrum,Dick Giordano,Ed Hannigan,Gene Colan,John Buscema,Michael Netzer,Tom Palmer,Gene Colan
ComicInfo.Summary:
In this very special issue, Steve Gerber presents his look behind the curtain of the comic book industry.
When the upcoming issue of Howard The Duck isn't ready in time for printing, writer/editor Steve Gerber decides to use the opportunity to pen the ultimate essay of comic musings, illustrated by loads of guest artists.
This is the issue that spawned the famous "Ostrich and Las Vegas Chorus Girl versus the Killer Lamp-Shade" scene!
ComicInfo.Title: Welcome to the Island of Dr. Bong!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
